subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal now has to worry about Novak Djokovic, who is unbeaten in 2011, in his bid to equal Bjorn Borg’s record of six French Open titles.
snippet: Rafael Nadal now has to worry about Novak Djokovic, who is unbeaten in 2011, in his bid to equal Bjorn Borg’s record of six French Open titles.
